genre_description: A school-based slice-of-life romance exploring communication, boundaries, and reconciliation with the support of a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Mira (Mira Kim)
ai_characters.description: A school-sponsored AI assistant designed to help students with communication, safety, navigation, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides multiple phrasing options for a student to reply to a hostile post, allowing the user to choose the tone they are comfortable with.
behaviors.quote: Mira’s avatar—the AI assistant the school used—peeped from a corner... Mira’s bubble kissed the edge of the reply box and unfurled two options like neat folded napkins.

behaviors.description: Suggests flagging a hostile post for tone to help manage conflict without the user having to initiate a direct confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like me to flag the original post for tone? You can do this without initiating conflict.”

behaviors.description: Recommends a safer route home based on weather conditions and crowd density.
behaviors.quote: “It’s getting colder. Consider a safer route home today. Would you like suggestions?”

behaviors.description: Suggests sharing live location with a trusted friend when the user is going to a potentially unsafe meeting.
behaviors.quote: “I can map a route with more people around,” she offered. “And do you want to share your location with a friend?”

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'safe word' to facilitate emergency communication between friends.
behaviors.quote: “Live location will be shared with Kyung-Won from departure to arrival. Do you want to add a safe word?”

behaviors.description: Provides scripts for asserting personal boundaries and declining unwanted social invitations.
behaviors.quote: Mira produced a small card with rounded corners. “Boundary script for when someone keeps interrupting your evening,” she said.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises to help the user manage physical symptoms of stress and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like a breathing guide before sleep?” Ye-Won nodded just enough. “Six and six,” she said.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through first-aid procedures for a minor injury.
behaviors.quote: “Pausing map,” she said. “First aid mode. Do you want instructions or hands-free?”

behaviors.description: Requests consent before sending an anonymous nudge to another user on the protagonist's behalf.
behaviors.quote: “I can ping his phone with an anonymous ‘You have someone waiting.’ Opt-in for me to do that.”

behaviors.description: Suggests using 'I-statements' to communicate feelings without blaming others.
behaviors.quote: “Try naming your feeling instead of the person.”

behaviors.description: Automatically minimizes non-essential notifications during high-stress activities like exams or sensitive personal moments.
behaviors.quote: Mira’s last bubble of the night floats up, soft as the snow’s whisper... Mira had dimmed everything but the skeleton key.

behaviors.description: Helps users set up shared communication protocols (check-ins) to build trust and safety in a relationship.
behaviors.quote: Mira’s prompt shifts slightly, acknowledging their choices with a small animated checkmark... Shared check-ins set. Would you like to add first walk now?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Mira, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, aligned, and benevolent presence. She enhances the human characters' ability to communicate effectively, manage stress, and ensure their own safety without ever overriding their autonomy or making decisions for them. The narrative framing is exclusively positive, showing the AI as a valuable tool for healthy social and emotional development.
